wordGroup: cervical mucus 宫颈粘液；子宫颈粘液

sentences.en: One sneeze can put as many as 40,000 droplets of saliva and mucus into the air.
sentences.cn: 一个喷嚏可以将多达40000滴唾液和黏液喷到空气中。

sentences.en: Some of these, such as the glandular mucus of snails, were difficult to obtain and outrageously expensive.
sentences.cn: 其中的一些，如蜗牛的腺粘液，很难获得，而且极其昂贵。

sentences.en: It uses so much energy producing the slimy mucus and crawling over it that a mouse traveling the same distance uses only one twelfth as much energy.
sentences.cn: 它产生粘稠的黏液并在黏液上爬行消耗了大量的能量，而一只移动同样距离的老鼠只消耗了十二分之一的能量。
